code: /*Imports section, do not touch*/import axios from'axios';/*This constant controlls the amount of books or results we want to show up*/var LIMIT="&maxResults=20";export var searchGoogleBooks=function searchGoogleBooks(query){return axios.get('https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q='+LIMIT,{params:{q:query}});};export var findAll=function findAll(){return axios.get('/api/books');};export var create=function create(bookData){return axios.post('/api/books',bookData);};export var remove=function remove(bookId){return axios.delete("/api/books/".concat(bookId));};export default{create:create,findAll:findAll,remove:remove,searchGoogleBooks:searchGoogleBooks};
